title: swirly serif..
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202054809im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Various-60s--70s-The-Spirit-Of-the-402467_4865.jpg)

hi all

any thoughts on what this started out as?

best  
rr

 [‹ blocky font id](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202054809/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40611 "Go to previous forum topic") [WASTED GERMAN YOUTH typo ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202054809/http:/www.typophile.com/node/40617 "Go to next forum topic")
author: richieRich01

comments.content: That surely started out as Pretoria. Digitized by DTP Types as [Pretorian](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202054809/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dtptypes/pretorian-dt/) and by Dieter Steffmann as [Vivian](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202054809/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/steffmann/samples/v/vivian.htm).
